name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"e5765251-e931-486e-9283-582a7a830e3f","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Group: Argument Registration & Data Entry","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"794846a8-1fd9-4847-9afc-21f17e49c1bb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This group of methods within the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NamePointer","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class manages the "input" phase of function analysis. When the analyzer encounters a function call, it uses these methods to populate the pointer with the arguments being passed. These functions bridge the gap between ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"positional calling","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func(10)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"named calling","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"func(count=10)","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), ensuring the values are correctly associated with their target parameters.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cd07a68e-3c33-47e2-beaf-de73933ec950","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"62fe38cb-0847-4086-83e5-bb4f9464e61c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e3fa8c07-0818-4c0d-9321-5eb07883d785","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"add_arg(name, item)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The primary entry point for adding data to a named parameter.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"7625c9f5-ff39-4dc1-bd3c-8509292379db","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"item","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a string, it is added to the set of values for that name.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e1b6e5a9-11a0-4afa-ac8d-a7731db9c349","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"item","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a set, it performs a union with existing values.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"51948dc1-ddcf-4df7-9d3d-4b5870af5471","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Internal Logic","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":": If the argument name does not exist yet, it is initialized automatically.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"ee3452c2-4120-486f-bd0c-8b0f8f9b45fe","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"add_lit_arg(name, item)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Similar to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_arg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", but specifically for raw literal values. It uses the normalization logic found in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"LiteralPointer","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to categorize the input:","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"eddf20d4-42a1-4eef-a10d-98b9dac41f74","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Strings become ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""STRING"","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d212ed26-5199-47ef-a9b9-51453ac8a48e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Integers become ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""INTEGER"","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cc0a00b9-9647-4cb6-8eab-fa529261fe9c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Other types become ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""UNKNOWN"","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"da6c51ec-2398-437e-832f-2cafa9ae2337","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"add_pos_arg(pos, name, item)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Registers an argument based on its index in the function call.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"24619e21-4c15-4e83-8564-275106cd16cf","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It converts the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pos","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (position) into a string identifier.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c7f577a4-8c73-46f9-8097-bbb48e8448b0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a bi-directional map: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pos_to_name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"name_to_pos","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f192fd89-7ae7-4e0e-a993-00de38547164","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If no ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is provided, it defaults to the string representation of the position.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"369bf75a-aed4-4dc7-a4d7-b1393fcfe1d3","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"add_name_arg(name, item)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"A dedicated wrapper for adding keyword arguments. It passes the data directly to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_arg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8e977d65-73ca-423b-bbfe-d36de316520f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"add_pos_lit_arg(pos, name, item)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"A hybrid method used when a literal value is passed at a specific position. It handles both the positional-to-name mapping and the literal normalization in a single step.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"41e6319c-a50e-42d6-b453-f218fac2b224","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"d38b6694-1aec-4d60-a3c6-002f20c6bf89","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2ec56e14-572d-4b20-91c4-d99202b1c9a6","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"# Analyzing: send_email(0, "admin@test.com", subject="Alert")
args_pointer = NamePointer()

# 1. Positional Literal: line 0, name "retries", value 0
args_pointer.add_pos_lit_arg(0, "retries", 0)

# 2. Positional String: line 1, name "recipient", value "admin@test.com"
args_pointer.add_pos_arg(1, "recipient", "admin@test.com")

# 3. Named Keyword: name "subject", value "Alert"
args_pointer.add_name_arg("subject", "Alert")

# Resulting state:
# 'retries'   -> {'INTEGER'}
# 'recipient' -> {'admin@test.com'}
# 'subject'   -> {'Alert'}","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a1620934-acb1-4b93-8547-cd430f87ffec","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b3123069-6691-4e8e-afb6-6ae7d2299d77","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dual-Mapping","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By recording both the position and the name, the system can handle functions where the parameter name might not be known until later in the analysis (e.g., analyzing the call before the definition).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e472c4bc-4c10-467a-9758-f188bb45fbd2","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Position Sanitization","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": All positional arguments are passed through an internal check (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"_sanitize_pos","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to ensure the indices are valid integers, preventing malformed analysis data.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"295f6999-0b2d-4bd2-8c9b-a27c73ce3b49","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
